name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, barbell on your back
Lower down by bending at hips and knees
Keep chest up and knees tracking over toes
Push through heels to return to starting position
formTips: Keep your core tight throughout the movement
Don't let your knees cave inward
Descend until thighs are parallel to the floor
Drive through your heels, not your toes

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on bench with feet firmly on ground
Grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width
Lower bar to chest with control
Press bar back up to arm's length
formTips: Keep your shoulder blades pinched together
Maintain a slight arch in your back
Don't bounce the bar off your chest
Keep your wrists straight and strong

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot
Bend at hips and knees to grasp the bar
Keep chest up and shoulders back
Drive through heels to lift the bar
formTips: Keep the bar close to your body throughout
Don't round your back
Push the floor away with your feet
Finish with hips forward, not by leaning back

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Hang from bar with palms facing away
Pull yourself up until chin clears the bar
Lower yourself with control
Repeat for desired reps
formTips: Start from a dead hang with arms fully extended
Pull with your back muscles, not just arms
Avoid swinging or using momentum
Control the descent for maximum benefit

name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position with hands under shoulders
Lower chest to floor while keeping body straight
Push back up to starting position
Maintain straight line from head to heels
formTips: Keep your core engaged throughout
Don't let your hips sag or pike up
Full range of motion for best results
Breathe in on the way down, out on the way up
